name: It's Soupin' Time
description:
Oh no! You are a tiny chef in a giant kitchen, and your prized soup is missing some key ingredients. You must navigate across conveniently placed chairs, cabinets and spoons to traverse the kitchen, reach ingredients, throw them back towards the center and add them to the broth before time runs out.

Try to stick to a similar flavor profile, as some ingredients don't mix well....

I wouldn't put steak in a sweet soup.

But watch out for the bacteria trying to ruin your soup! They can be destroyed, but only if you throw knives at them, so be careful

a Unity 3d game
